name: excel-mcp
description: Excel automation for AI assistants - manage Sheets, Power Query, DAX, VBA, PowerPivot, Tables, Ranges, Charts, Formatting, Validation & more - requires Excel to be installed

scripts.clean: cd .. && dotnet clean src/ExcelMcp.McpServer/ExcelMcp.McpServer.csproj -c Release && dotnet clean src/ExcelMcp.CLI/ExcelMcp.CLI.csproj -c Release
scripts.build:mcp-server: npm run clean && cd .. && dotnet publish src/ExcelMcp.McpServer/ExcelMcp.McpServer.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=true -p:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true -p:PublishTrimmed=false -p:PublishReadyToRun=false -p:NuGetAudit=false -o vscode-extension/bin --verbosity minimal
scripts.build:cli: cd .. && dotnet publish src/ExcelMcp.CLI/ExcelMcp.CLI.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained true -p:PublishSingleFile=true -p:IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract=true -p:PublishTrimmed=false -p:PublishReadyToRun=false -p:NuGetAudit=false -o vscode-extension/bin --verbosity minimal
scripts.build:all: npm run build:mcp-server && npm run build:cli
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run build:all && npm run copy:skills && npm run compile
scripts.package: npm run build:all && npm run copy:skills && vsce package
